li.p: Starting from version 7.0.0, Windows desktop application testing is available on Katalon Studio.

section.title: switchToApplication

ul.li: Description: Switch from the current running driver to the application Windows Driver.

section.codeblock:
"Start the note pad application" Windows.startApplication('C:\\Windows\\System32\\notepad.exe')
"Switch to control the desktop" Windows.switchToDesktop()
// Do some stuffs with the desktop
"Switch back to control the note pad application" Windows.switchToApplication()
